alert.note: Alert for Clay (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 18 at 8:48AM CDT until May 19 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... South Dakota... Little Sioux River at Spencer affecting Clay County. James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Little Sioux River above Spencer / Highway 18 affecting Clay County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River at Spencer. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, the right bank overflows, and minor flooding of the Spencer city park and some rural agricultural areas begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 AM CDT Thursday was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 8.8 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Little Sioux River Spencer 10.0 10.1 Thu 7 am 9.8 9.6 9.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning.
